meanings.definition: A family of carnivorous mammals including weasels, otters, badgers, and ferrets.
meanings.sent1: Mustelids are known for their sleek bodies and sharp teeth.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of mustelids playing by the river.
meanings.sent3: The mustelids decided to have a dance-off to determine the best hunter.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as fierce as a pack of mustelids on the hunt.
meanings.sent5: The mustelids' playful antics brought joy to the forest.
